overview: These filthy whores need to learn a fucking lesson, and we found just the men to teach it to these fuck pigs. They open their fuck holes wide, and take everything that's given to them. Bailey Brooks, Swiss Balls and Eve Nicholson will learn a lesson in this hard fuck fest. And if they should happen to put up a fight, these wayward women will soon find out, it's best to do as daddy says!
title: Tough Love 16
